javadoc: Invoked when disconnecting, the parameter is a ChatComponent describing the reason for termination

methods.name: a
javadoc: There are two recognized intentions for initiating a handshake: logging in and acquiring server status. The NetworkManager's protocol will be reconfigured according to the specified intention, although a login-intention must pass a versioncheck or receive a disconnect otherwise
